name: Echo - An Indie Tale
description:
A contemplative, single-player 2D navigation game with easy controls, yet challenging.

Move: A W S D or ← ↑ ↓ →
Action: Space

  • Original soundtrack and neat sound design to create an immersive and thrilling experience.
  • There are several obstacles in the game, but the "checkpoints" make the experience less punitive.
  • During gameplay there are no texts, and no need for them.
  • Animations, symbols and mechanics communicate to the player everything necessary to enjoy the experience.


A dark and hostile world. There are many traps in this place.
Can you continue? Can you find it?
Navigate cautiously. Take it easy. Pay attention to the clues. And everything will be fine.


With an enigmatic atmosphere, sometimes even dark, and beautiful scenery, "Echo - An Indie Tale" will conquer you.
